attributes.action: INSTATE HARRY FOX FOR PRIME MINISTER!
attributes.additional_details:
Harry has a vision for this country. That is one where the people are heard and listened to. He will not lie to you- he will give you the brutal, honest truth, even if you don't want to hear it. Harry will battle for dead on equal rights for men and women, homosexuals and lesbians, black people and white people.

Harry has spent time working with MP's and experienced Government and Politics specialist. They and he feel it's time for something new. A new England, done by Harry Fox.
attributes.background: Harry is a 16 year old A-Level student in Kent. He has a strong knowledge and background in Government and Politics. He could be the person for the people, if you vote him in you will see a new United Kingdom.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
